HELLO, I'M SINA.

I CREATE PRODUCTS.

I’m a freelance software developer located in Toronto, ON with 8 years of experience designing, implementing, and maintaining commercial and enterprise applications for government, banks, and web startups.

I have been a frequent speaker and attendee at technical conferences, particularly those focused on the Ruby programming language and Java, published a few articles around different development stacks.
